name: Vocab-Made-Easy
tagline: Java Application made to get a list of definitions given the words.
body:
### Inspiration
I came up with this idea when I was in 12th grade physics class and I kept getting pounded with lists of vocab I had to do. I was so tired of having to go into the book and find where it was and then writing it down. I would like to see students in High School get to use this program to make their lives a lot easier and cut their vocab homework time.

### What It Does
The Backend of the program parses the data from dictionary.com and then uses a couple formatting functions to get it to the user how he/she wants it.

### What I Made It With
I made the Graphical User Interface(GUI) With Netbeans, and then coded the actual project inside of Eclipse and IntelliJ. 

### Authors and Contributors
I am the only contributor at this time, Andrew Corp @corpandrew

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the program? Send me an email at corpa@wit.edu for any help you may need.
